actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act.

summary.text: Increases, under the Small Business Act, the total amount of loans which are outstanding, not to exceed: (1) $7,400,000,000 under specified sections of this Act and the Economic Opportunity Act; (2) $800,000,000 under title III of the Small Business Investment Act; (3) $650,000,000 under title V of the Small Business Investment Act; and (4) $500,000,000 under the Economic Opportunity Act. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 633(c)(4))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act.
